FC-FOOTLOCKER.title: Footlocker Ammo Box
FC-FOOTLOCKER.description: Lightweight 15/32 sheathing ply, dual removable trays.

FC-RB-300.title: Rangemaster 300
FC-RB-300.description: Compact box sized for three 4x4x2 trays.

FC-RB-1000.title: Range Box 1000 (9mm)
FC-RB-1000.description: Holds ~1000 rounds 9mm with sliding shelf; sold out example.

FC-RM-400.title: Rangemaster 400
FC-RM-400.description: Up to 400 rounds in one compact carry; no mess. Just open-load-shoot-close. Small enough to grab and go, big enough to store ammo for the day.

FC-CLASSIC.title: Freedom Crate Classic
FC-CLASSIC.description: The original handcrafted ammo box that launched Freedom Crate Co. Built for durability and timeless style, measurements based on a real Cold War-era ammunition box. Holds 1,000 rounds of 9mm. Interior dimensions: 11" wide × 8¼" long × 5½" deep.
